  • BATTLE OF DAZAR’ALOR HEROIC BOOST

    Boost type
    Loot system
    • STANDARD Personal Loot – The amount of loot you will get is TOTALY RANDOM and fully depends on your luck, which we wish you the most (NO LOOT TRADING! But at least you will get achievements and and a chance to obtain gear via BONUS ROLLS)
    • ADVANCED Personal Loot – There will be 3 non-saved boosters of your Armor Type (cloth, leather, mail or plate), who are going to trade you ALL GEAR and WEAPONS they receive during the raid. GUARANTEE: at least 4+ items in different slots
    • PREMIUM Personal Loot – There will be 5 non-saved boosters of your Armor Type (cloth, leather, mail or plate), who are going to trade you ALL GEAR and WEAPONS they receive during the raid. GUARANTEE: at least 6+ items in different slots
    • We guarantee at least 4 (Advanced PL) or 6 (Premium PL) items in different slots. You can always get 10 or even more items if you're really lucky, drop is random . Bonus roll items, items that you receive yourself and items that do not upgrade count towards the guarantee . If you don't get the guaranteed number of items during the first raid, you will be invited next time to get a GUARANTEE. You must understand and accept that the raiders will not be able to trade you some items due to game mechanics restrictions.
    • Account sharing or Selfplayed
    BUY NOW
    $59

    This service will get you 9/9 Battle for Dazar'Alor bosses killed in HEROIC mode. The Raid takes 2-3 hours. You will get ilvl 400+ gear and 3 factional achieves. You will also get Ahead of the Curve: Lady Jaina Proudmoore, a raider's must-have achieve.

    ETA: 1-5 days

HOW IT WORKS

  • Choose

  • Contact

  • Pay

  • Watch

Choose your boost

Dear customer. You are free to choose a service out of the list we have available. Each service have a detailed description.

Contact us

After decision is made please contact the manager by the method, most convenient for you. Manager will clarify any questions and will schedule a party for you.

Pay for the order

At checkout please specify your contacts. Its essential to give us an armory link for your character

Sit back and enjoy the show!

Once your run is completed, please feel free to leave a review about your experience.

OUR POLICYTY

Introduction The Seller – Boost Royale The Customer -You, visitor, user.

Boost Royale has no affiliation with Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. or its companies. Registered Names and Trademarks are the copyright and property of their respective owners. World of Warcraft and Warcraft are registered trademarks of Blizzard Entertainment, Inc., in the U.S.A. and/or other countries. All game content included on our website, such as graphics, images, data compilations are owned by the game publisher © Blizzard Entertainment or its licensors and protected by United States and international copyright laws.

Communication

When visiting Boost Royale, it means you are communicating with us electronically. You are consenting to receive electronic communications from us. We might be using such methods as Live chat, Skype, Discord, Facebook messenger, Telegram or Email to communicate with you. You are agreeing that any information provided to us is truthful and factual without any intentional alterations or omissions.

Refund

If we did not manage to complete your order in the specified time terms, you have the right to request a refund, or we may refund the money in our own discretion. You have the right to cancel your order and ask for a full refund at any time before the start of the service. You have the right to cancel your order after the start of the service and ask for a partial refund. In this case, the amount of the refund will be proportional to the volume of the unfinished services. If the service is completed for 100% any kind of compensation is impossible. The presence of a screenshot with the fulfilled condition of the order is proof that the order is executed and the service is provided in full. In this case, you cannot request a refund. The Customer agrees that all screenshots which were made during the service may be used as an evidence in case disputes occur in future.

Account risk

Buying in-game Services for real money is against the terms and conditions for most online games, especially Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. games. By using our services, you accept the risk of account suspension. Even though we always use all the measures which help to avoid account suspension, we cannot provide 100% guarantee that it will not happen with your account while using ‘Account Sharing’ services. If your account will receive any disciplinary action, we can not be held accountable, and you accept this when you complete any purchase.

Copyright

All copyrights and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. The Seller claims no affiliation with Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. and its companies or trademarks such as World of Warcraft and Warcraft.

Redaction

We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its policies relating to the Website or Services at any time, effective upon posting of an updated version of this Agreement on the Website. Continued use of the Website after any such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes.

Acceptance

You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By using the Website or its Services you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to use or access the Website and its Services.

ABOUT US

Boost Royale is a professional game boosting company. Currently it's being managed by highly experienced team (ex hardcore players) and its hiring almost unlimited number of solos, small groups of players and well organized big guilds to execute orders.

Boost Royale where online video game players can get various services aimed at improving their in-game progress. We are sharing our gaming knowledge, experience and advances to help players from all over the world with obtaining of the hardest in-game achievements, titles and ratings.
